why_good_fit: THE premier sunset venue in Comporta. Golden sands, sophisticated bohemian atmosphere, excellent acoustics for live looping. Operating May-September with full restaurant facilities. Perfect for hybrid sets with natural beach amphitheater effect.
Authentic Comporta experience with relaxed vibe. DJ sets on weekends transition into sunset parties. Lower-key crowd creates intimate setting for live looping + electronic fusion.

address: Av. António Augusto de Aguiar 2, 1050-016 Lisbon (ME Lisbon Hotel)
why_good_fit: Spectacular 360° views over Parque Eduardo VII. High-energy nightlife destination with sophisticated crowd. World-class DJ infrastructure ideal for live looping sunset transitions.

why_good_fit: One of Lisbon's most iconic rooftops on a historic parking garage. Breathtaking sunset views over Tagus River. Bohemian crowd appreciative of experimental live sets. Year-round operation.

why_good_fit: Stunning Tagus River views in intimate Bairro Alto setting. The Lumiares Hotel offers full hospitality support. Emphasis on sunset experiences. Sophisticated clientele.

why_good_fit: 16th-floor panoramic views perfect for sunset timing. Tivoli Hotels infrastructure provides professional event support. Modern aesthetic suits contemporary live+DJ format.
Algarve's hottest sunset venue with established reputation for hosting world-class DJs. Open-air setup perfect for live looping acoustics. Professional production infrastructure.
20+ year legacy of sunset parties and live music. Marina location provides scenic backdrop. Summer programming includes live music nights ideal for hybrid sets.
Luxury 5-star resort infrastructure with professional event support. Friday Beach Sessions established programming. Artist-focused brand aligns with artistic vision.

why_good_fit: Newly refurbished with modern aesthetics. Friday & Saturday sunset beach lounge parties. Morning fitness + sunset sessions create full-day event potential. Vila Vita Parc luxury resort backing.
Elevated Douro River views with acoustic intimacy. Saturday live music programming established. Jazz/blues audience appreciates experimental sounds. Live looping could attract new listeners.
